name: phaser3_lady_in_trouble
description: A simple game with phaserjs for kaios

scripts.init: npx cap init && npx cap add android && npx cap sync
scripts.run: npm run apk && npx cap run android
scripts.setup: npm run clean:output && npx parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir www
scripts.dev: npm run clean:output && npx parcel serve src/index.dev.html -p 8080 --dist-dir www
scripts.app: npm run clean:output && npx parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir www --no-source-maps && npx cap copy
scripts.build: npm run clean:output && npx parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir www --no-source-maps
scripts.apk: npm run build && npx cap copy && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.make_icons: npx capacitor-resources -p android,ios && npx cap sync

author: micheg
